content:
Sure, here's a table of items found in "Chronicles of Everia", along with relevant information such as damage and price:

| Item | Type | Damage | Price (in gold) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Short Sword | Melee Weapon | 1d6 | 10 |
| Long Sword | Melee Weapon | 1d8 | 15 |
| Great Axe | Melee Weapon | 1d12 | 25 |
| Mace | Melee Weapon | 1d6 | 8 |
| Warhammer | Melee Weapon | 1d8 | 12 |
| Dagger | Melee Weapon | 1d4 | 5 |
| Shortbow | Ranged Weapon | 1d6 | 25 |
| Longbow | Ranged Weapon | 1d8 | 40 |
| Crossbow | Ranged Weapon | 1d10 | 50 |
| Arrows (20) | Ammunition | - | 1 |
| Bolts (20) | Ammunition | - | 2 |
| Leather Armor | Armor | - | 10 |
| Chain Mail | Armor | - | 75 |
| Plate Mail | Armor | - | 200 |
| Shield | Shield | - | 15 |
| Healing Potion | Consumable | - | 50 |
| Mana Potion | Consumable | - | 50 |
| Lockpicks | Tool | - | 25 |
| Rope (50ft) | Tool | - | 10 |

Note: The damage listed is for a successful hit on a target. The damage may be modified by other factors, such as the target's armor, the attacker's strength or dexterity, or other bonuses and penalties. Prices listed are in gold, which is the standard currency in "Chronicles of Everia".
